texts.content: The phone rang, then rang again, until finally, someone answered the ringing.
The waves crashed against the rocks, pulling back only to hit the rocks again, shaping the rocks over time.
The leaves rustled in the wind, the wind carrying whispers through the trees, and the wind continued on its endless journey.
The forest was full of birds, each bird singing a unique tune, the sound of the birds filling the air.
The sun slowly rose, its light creeping over the horizon, marking the beginning of a new day as the sky rose in color.
